content: Hey everyone guess what?! It's time to put your track proposal in for Connectathon 29 which will take place virtually from January 10 - 12, 2022. Track proposals must be submitted no later than November 9, 2021 for review. Confluence page is here: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2022+-+01+Connectathon+29 (from @Sandra Vance )
Early bird discount for January Connectathon ends this Saturday, December 4! See https://www.hl7.org/events/fhir/connectathon/2022/01/ for more information and registration.

Good Morning,
Today between 11am and 12pm EST the List Server will be undergoing maintenance. During this window of downtime the list server will not send any emails. If you send an email during this window Office 365 will queue the message and send it when the system comes back online. Your mail message WILL GO OUT after we bring the system back online, so no mail message will be lost if you send during the maintenance window.

Thank you for your patience and understanding.
Eric Schmitt Webmaster@hl7.org
